items.content_text:
### Main

*   ⭐️ [core-js-pure (⭐25k)](https://github.com/zloirock/core-js) - The entire standard library.

### Uncategorised

*   [es6-promise (⭐7.3k)](https://github.com/stefanpenner/es6-promise) - [`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)
*   [es6-map (⭐73)](https://github.com/medikoo/es6-map) - [`Map`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Map)
*   [es6-weak-map (⭐30)](https://github.com/medikoo/es6-weak-map) - [`WeakMap`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/WeakMap)
*   [es6-set (⭐45)](https://github.com/medikoo/es6-set) - [`Set`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Set)
*   [es6-symbol (⭐180)](https://github.com/medikoo/es6-symbol) - [`Symbol`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Symbol)
*   [named-regexp-groups (⭐10)](https://github.com/commenthol/named-regexp-groups) - [`RegExp`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/RegExp)
*   [globalthis (⭐156)](https://github.com/ljharb/System.global) - [`globalThis`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/globalThis)

### Numbers

*   [bignumber.js (⭐6.9k)](https://github.com/MikeMcl/bignumber.js) - [`BigInt`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/BigInt)

### Arrays

*   [indexof (⭐15)](https://github.com/component/indexof) - [`Array.prototype.indexOf`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/indexOf).
*   [array-from (⭐16)](https://github.com/studio-b12/array-from) - [`Array.from`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/from)
*   [array.prototype.every (⭐7)](https://github.com/es-shims/Array.prototype.every) - [`Array.prototype.every`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/every)
*   [array.prototype.find (⭐37)](https://github.com/paulmillr/Array.prototype.find) - [`Array.prototype.find`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/find)
*   [array.prototype.some (⭐2)](https://github.com/es-shims/Array.prototype.some) - [`Array.prototype.some`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/some)
*   [array.prototype.flatmap (⭐32)](https://github.com/es-shims/Array.prototype.flatMap) - [`Array.prototype.flatMap`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/flatMap)
*   [array-map](https://github.com/substack/array-map) - [`Array.prototype.map`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/map)
*   [array-foreach (⭐8)](https://github.com/twada/array-foreach) - [`Array.prototype.forEach`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/forEach)
*   [array-includes (⭐43)](https://github.com/es-shims/array-includes) - [`Array.prototype.includes`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/includes)

### Strings

*   [string.prototype.trim (⭐13)](https://github.com/es-shims/String.prototype.trim) - [`String.prototype.trim`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String/Trim)
*   [string.prototype.trimleft (⭐7)](https://github.com/es-shims/String.prototype.trimleft) - [`String.prototype.trimStart`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String/TrimStart)
*   [string.prototype.trimright (⭐8)](https://github.com/es-shims/String.prototype.trimright) - [`String.prototype.trimEnd`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String/TrimEnd)
*   [string.prototype.replaceall (⭐36)](https://github.com/es-shims/String.prototype.replaceAll) - [`String.prototype.replaceAll`](https://github.com/tc39/proposal-string-replaceall)

### Objects

*   [object.fromentries (⭐33)](https://github.com/es-shims/Object.fromEntries) - [`Object.fromEntries`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object/fromEntries)
*   [object.entries (⭐57)](https://github.com/es-shims/Object.entries) - [`Object.entries`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object/entries)
*   [object-keys (⭐45)](https://github.com/ljharb/object-keys) - [`Object.keys`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object/keys)
*   [object.values (⭐72)](https://github.com/es-shims/Object.values) - [`Object.values`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object/values)
*   [object-assign (⭐919)](https://github.com/sindresorhus/object-assign) - [`Object.assign`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object/assign)
*   [object-is (⭐25)](https://github.com/es-shims/object-is) - [`Object.is`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object/is)
*   [json3 (⭐1k)](https://github.com/bestiejs/json3) - [`JSON`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/JSON)

### Browser Features

*   [cross-fetch (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/lquixada/cross-fetch) - [`fetch`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Fetch_API)
*   [cross-blob (⭐12)](https://github.com/Richienb/cross-blob) - [`Blob`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Blob)
*   [cross-formdata (⭐1)](https://github.com/Richienb/cross-formdata) - [`FormData`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/FormData)
*   [abortcontroller-polyfill (⭐337)](https://github.com/mo/abortcontroller-polyfill) - [`AbortController`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/AbortController)
*   [@fastly/performance-observer-polyfill (⭐30)](https://github.com/fastly/performance-observer-polyfill) - [`PerformanceObserver`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/PerformanceObserver)
*   [performance-now (⭐0)](https://github.com/braveg1rl/performance-now) - [`performance.now`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Performance/now)
*   [console.table (⭐139)](https://github.com/bahmutov/console.table) - [`console.table`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Console/table)

### Node.js Features

*   [events (⭐1.4k)](https://github.com/Gozala/events) - [`EventEmitter`](https://nodejs.org/api/events.html#events_class_eventemitter)
*   [tickedoff (⭐218)](https://github.com/jamiebuilds/tickedoff) - [`setImmediate`](https://nodejs.org/api/timers.html#timers_setimmediate_callback_args)
*   [buffer-from (⭐24)](https://github.com/LinusU/buffer-from) - [`Buffer.from`](https://nodejs.org/api/buffer.html#buffer_class_method_buffer_from_array)
items.content_html:
Main

  • ⭐️ core-js-pure (⭐25k) - The entire standard library.

Uncategorised

  • es6-promise (⭐7.3k) - Promise
  • es6-map (⭐73) - Map
  • es6-weak-map (⭐30) - WeakMap
  • es6-set (⭐45) - Set
  • es6-symbol (⭐180) - Symbol
  • named-regexp-groups (⭐10) - RegExp
  • globalthis (⭐156) - globalThis

Numbers

  • bignumber.js (⭐6.9k) - BigInt

Arrays

  • indexof (⭐15) - Array.prototype.indexOf.
  • array-from (⭐16) - Array.from
  • array.prototype.every (⭐7) - Array.prototype.every
  • array.prototype.find (⭐37) - Array.prototype.find
  • array.prototype.some (⭐2) - Array.prototype.some
  • array.prototype.flatmap (⭐32) - Array.prototype.flatMap
  • array-map - Array.prototype.map
  • array-foreach (⭐8) - Array.prototype.forEach
  • array-includes (⭐43) - Array.prototype.includes

Strings

  • string.prototype.trim (⭐13) - String.prototype.trim
  • string.prototype.trimleft (⭐7) - String.prototype.trimStart
  • string.prototype.trimright (⭐8) - String.prototype.trimEnd
  • string.prototype.replaceall (⭐36) - String.prototype.replaceAll

Objects

  • object.fromentries (⭐33) - Object.fromEntries
  • object.entries (⭐57) - Object.entries
  • object-keys (⭐45) - Object.keys
  • object.values (⭐72) - Object.values
  • object-assign (⭐919) - Object.assign
  • object-is (⭐25) - Object.is
  • json3 (⭐1k) - JSON

Browser Features

  • cross-fetch (⭐1.7k) - fetch
  • cross-blob (⭐12) - Blob
  • cross-formdata (⭐1) - FormData
  • abortcontroller-polyfill (⭐337) - AbortController
  • @fastly/performance-observer-polyfill (⭐30) - PerformanceObserver
  • performance-now (⭐0) - performance.now
  • console.table (⭐139) - console.table

Node.js Features

  • events (⭐1.4k) - EventEmitter
  • tickedoff (⭐218) - setImmediate
  • buffer-from (⭐24) - Buffer.from
